!Chuta Kaimu: The outsider of fate! (The engraved letters on Chuta Kaimu's monument scatter, then begin to form a new pattern. You suspect that it may be searching for information regarding the outsider of fate. Finally the letters stop moving, having reassembled themselves into a new pattern.)
